we need to expand Medicaid in North
Carolina the governor wants to pass
Medicaid expansion but it's currently
not in the budget and the Republicans

a benefit from Medicaid expansion of its
past but this isn't just a problem in
North Carolina 13 other states had yet
to expand Medicaid in total this leaves
4.5 million Americans without health
care coverage I'm an industrial
electrician I have a spine disease
because spinal stenosis and when I lost
money insurance and I didn't have no
means to get my medication I've been
resorted to illegal activities such as
stealing and selling them and it put me
in the court system prison and it's like
an ongoing thing trying to get out of

work I realized that I was $80 out of

much to qualify for Medicaid I did what
an average citizen does they just do and
do until they're sick it's not

life is really what it boils down to my

teen Jessica had struggled with mental

to take care of my children to prepare
